Name: Simulate color blindness
Description: Can I simulate different color blindness conditions to test my web page?

Notes: 1. Click the **Debug tools** icon to open the list of available debug tools. Switch to the **Simulators** tab to find various color blindness conditions like, **Red-green**, **Blue-yellow**, and **Full** color blindness. Toggle the conditions to simulate the deficiency on the page.
References: 1. Developing for color blindness with Polypane, [Polypane Blog](https://polypane.app/blog/developing-for-color-blindness-with-polypane/)

Notes: 1. In the **Accessibility** panel, from the toolbar open the **Simulate** menu and select the type of deficiency to simulate the page for the users with that deficiency.
